text: @WhiteHouse Trump Protecting Seniors, MY ASS? Tens of thousands of nursing home people dead from COVID19 & he doesn't even have a testing plan 4 them! And he wants 2 gut Social Security/Medicare! Let's not forget his "concern" 4 seniors in Puerto Rico! ⬇ Trump has shown us HIS ass already! https://t.co/Ke0ZWtWTdE
